statements: DELETE FROM local_water_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM local_water_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 100 AND compliance_status = TRUE;
DELETE FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM ComplianceRecords WHERE record_id = 101 AND compliance_status = 'True';
DELETE FROM WaterRegulations WHERE regulation_date < '2022-01-01' AND regulation_description IS NULL;
DELETE FROM inspection_records WHERE inspection_result = TRUE;
DELETE FROM Organizations WHERE location = 'New York'
